author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Queclink Wireless Solutions to pay A shares div for FY 2017 on April 12
text:
April 3 (Reuters) - Queclink Wireless Solutions Co Ltd :
* Says it will pay cash dividend of 2 yuan(before tax)/10 shares for 2017 to shareholders of record on April 11
* The companyâ€™s shares will be traded ex-right and ex-dividend on April 12 and the dividend will be paid on April 12
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/owrNGB
